title: The BROKE Gaming Challenge
description: This episode of Broke vs Pro takes a turn when Ken gets his precious pro budget taken away... The BROKE vs PRO gaming setup challenge!  We also bought cheap vs expensive gaming gear    Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:

Mr. Pro over here is about to be just a little bit more broke because, this time, there's no more cheating involved because you have the same budget. - Cheating? Dude, you literally bought a PC.
